description: Functional Expressive Emergent Cognitive Technical Intelligent Neural Generator a Key Value Pair Line Label Function Method Event Listener Zone Feature Action State Intent Belief Procedural Asynchronous Vector Programming Language. Feecting is a key value pair line label procedural dynamic programming language used in the development of Indra.ai, Deva.world, and all of our algorithms. Every project starts with a #feecting program then is extrapolated into other languages like HTML, Javascript, Python, C, C++, Swift, and Go.
